channel.title: [MINOR] Bullsquid can cause damage through wall when spin-attacking in Blast Pit generator room
channel.description:
Apologies if this has been reported numerous times but I did do a search but couldn't find any related threads. You most likely currently want STU bugs reported.
I've just experienced a minor glitch when playing the Blast Pit chapter. In the generator room there is a single Bullsquid. If you open the door and quickly leave the doorway to take cover, the Bullsquid can still damage you through the wall during a spin attack. At first I thought it was a prop that it had smashed through the door but if you stand to the left of the door switch it can still hit you through the wall.
map: bm_c1a4d at: 684 x, 4479 y, -575 z setpos 1280.985474 3742.113525 -575.968750;setang 16.171581 -49.052578 0.000000
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/255957425748516337/AE4604C5C0A47EAAD560B5CA67FEE71DDB5195CC/[/img]
Also within the same map there is a very minor graphical glitch with two monitors where the scientist is hiding. They don't appear as if they are behind the glass as the cross-hatched texture is not displayed in front of them. Sorry, its nothing game-breaking but just stood out. :slight_smile:
setpos 684.087952 4479.272949 -575.968750;setang 13.376842 179.674866 0.000000
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/255957425748519465/1F457DB03C2F8433AAAAABE2ADE28036441B6E10/[/img]

item.title: [MINOR] Bullsquid can cause damage through wall when spin-attacking in Blast Pit generator room
item.dc:creator: Wraggle
item.description:
Apologies if this has been reported numerous times but I did do a search but couldn’t find any related threads. You most likely currently want STU bugs reported.

I’ve just experienced a minor glitch when playing the Blast Pit chapter. In the generator room there is a single Bullsquid. If you open the door and quickly leave the doorway to take cover, the Bullsquid can still damage you through the wall during a spin attack. At first I thought it was a prop that it had smashed through the door but if you stand to the left of the door switch it can still hit you through the wall.

map: bm_c1a4d at: 684 x, 4479 y, -575 z
setpos 1280.985474 3742.113525 -575.968750;setang 16.171581 -49.052578 0.000000

1920×1080

Also within the same map there is a very minor graphical glitch with two monitors where the scientist is hiding. They don’t appear as if they are behind the glass as the cross-hatched texture is not displayed in front of them. Sorry, its nothing game-breaking but just stood out.

setpos 684.087952 4479.272949 -575.968750;setang 13.376842 179.674866 0.000000

1920×1080
